pullRequest.title: Test Geocoder with Google maps mock API if GOOGLE_GEOCODER_API_KEY is…

nodes.bodyText:
This is only needed for for the reflection hack in the test, right? I guess it is not necessary for users normal runtime operation?
If so, we can use a configuration property in the test:
quarkus.camel.native.reflection.include-patterns=com.google.maps.GeoApiContext$Builder
Knowledge sharing: one day this may become easier if Quarkus folks fix quarkusio/quarkus#9287 for us.

commit.message: Test Geocoder with Google maps mock API if GOOGLE_GEOCODER_API_KEY is not provided fixes #1860
